doc.title: Freak
doc.plot: Young medical student, Claire Spence is the only person to escape from the psychopathic serial killer, known by authorities as "Freak". Claire reluctantly attends the highly controversial execution where the monster's death will be the first of many, in a new form of executions known as harvesting. An unexpected lightning storm overloads the experimental machinery causing a chain-reaction that puts all of the attendees' lives in jeopardy.
